definition: variant of 滷味|卤味[lu3 wei4]

sentences.english: Sauced meat shop:Intestines and tripe are the favorite food for the people in the south.

sentences.english: He is now opened a braised food store, to do medicinal food.
sentences.chinese: 他目前开了一家卤味店，要做药膳。
